verses.name: Acts 22:4
verses.text: And I persecuted this way unto the death, binding and delivering into prisons both men and women.

verses.name: Acts 22:5
verses.text: As also the high priest doth bear me witness, and all the estate of the elders: from whom also I received letters unto the brethren, and went to Damascus, to bring them which were there bound unto Jerusalem, for to be punished.

verses.name: Acts 22:6
verses.text: And it came to pass, that, as I made my journey, and was come nigh unto Damascus about noon, suddenly there shone from heaven a great light round about me.
